name: BEN TRE, The Real Mekong - Day Tour
description:
Let’s join our day trip travel to Ben Tre - an natural land of coconut
in Mekong Delta where you will definitely get an insight into the locals’ daily
routines and activities as well as an good chance to understand more about some
of traditional jobs in the region such as brick-kiln, coconut processing
workshop, coconut candy making, mat weaving, and together with the activities
such as motor boat, rowing boat, biking, walking, rickshaw and so on... Specially, we organize the trip with small group in which max 8 person
and our tour guide with warmly hospitality and enthusiastic
